  <script>

      $(function () {
        var masterUi = MasterUI({
          isPostback: false,
        baseUrl: '/TDClient/',
        isTdGoogleAnalyticsEnabled: true,
        isAuthenticated: false
        });

      $('#collapseMe').collapseMe({
        toggleVisibilitySelector: '.navbar-toggle'
      });

    });

      // The sub-nav menu uses padding-top to position itself below the header bar and main navigation sections. When the
      // window is resized, there is a chance that the content of these header or nav sections wraps, causing the height
      // to change, potentially covering the sub-nav menu, which is obviously a big usability problem. This function
      // listens for when the window size or orientation is changing (and also when the window first loads), and adjusts
      // the padding so that the sub-nav menu appears in the correct location.
      $(window).bind('load ready resize orientationchange', function () {
        var headerHeight = $('#divMstrHeader').height();
        $('#navShim').css({
          "padding-top": headerHeight
        });

        $('#content').css({
          "padding-top": headerHeight,
          "margin-top": headerHeight * -1
        });
      });
  </script>

  <script>

    function ToggleFavorite() {
      __doPostBack('ctl00$ctl00$cpContent$cpContent$btnToggleFavorite', '');
    }

    function checkRecipients() {
      if ($('#ctl00_ctl00_cpContent_cpContent_shareRecipients').val().trim() === "") {
        alert('You must first enter a valid email.');
        $('#myModal').modal('toggle')
      }
    }

    function showHideCommentInput(show) {
      if (show) {
        $('#ctl00_ctl00_cpContent_cpContent_btnSaveComment').progressButton().progressButton('reset');
        $('#divComment').show();
        $('#ctl00_ctl00_cpContent_cpContent_txtComments').focus().val('');
        $("#luFeedCommentNotification").select2("val", null, true);
        $('#btnComment').hide();
      } else {
        $('#divComment').hide();
        $('#ctl00_ctl00_cpContent_cpContent_txtComments').val('');
        $("#luFeedCommentNotification").select2("val", null, true);
        $('#btnComment').show();
      }
    }

    $(function () {

      var attachmentHandler = new TeamDynamix.AttachmentHandler({
        containerSelector: '.js-service-attachments',
        resultLabelSelector: '#ctl00_ctl00_cpContent_cpContent_lblResults_lblResults-label',
        baseControllerUrl: '/TDClient/37/uic/Shared/Attachments',
        antiForgeryToken: 'fy7ITJS08l0iEAvIUimnUcOSA-Gi2ppF5nGVLQ9bl7-N5NRLXi5dR-sODQ4xKpteSBMzI6We9Pv-EJoKC5e9ApJaN7Y1:k_K6rRAXkTAagPYo-4Dozqng4fuAEeTz0yNA3XK3k-FVM9h4RqKUhVwD-zZ1wmSnRcdtEP2xBjNN3Qq0wBm-32r34kA1',
        itemId: 362,
        componentId: 47
      });

      // Don't try and update the table styles if the user wanted to opt out.
      $('#ctl00_ctl00_cpContent_cpContent_divDescription table:not(.SkipTableFixup)').each(function (table) {
        var padding = $(this).attr('cellpadding');
        var spacing = $(this).attr('cellspacing');

        $(this).css("border-collapse", "separate");

        if (spacing) {
          $(this).css("border-spacing", spacing + "px");
        }

        $(this).find('td').each(function (cell) { $(this).css('padding', padding + 'px') });
      });

      

    });

    

  </script>

  <span id="ctl00_ctl00_cpContent_cpContent_lblResults_ctl00" aria-live="polite" aria-atomic="true"><span id="ctl00_ctl00_cpContent_cpContent_lblResults_lblResults-label" class="red"></span></span>

  <ol class="breadcrumb">
    <li><a href="ServiceCatalog">Service Catalog</a></li><li><a href="ServiceCatalog?CategoryID=150">Communication and Collaboration</a></li><li class="active"><a href="ServiceCatalog?CategoryID=156">Conferencing and Telephones</a></li><li class="active">Zoom</li>
  </ol>

  

  <div class="row gutter-top">

    <div id="divMainContent" class="col-md-8">

      <h1 class="wrap-text">
        Zoom
      </h1>

      

      

      

      <div id="ctl00_ctl00_cpContent_cpContent_divDescription" class="gutter-top ckeShim"><h2><span style="font-size: 18px"><span style="color: #000080"><strong><big>What Is It?</big></strong></span></span></h2>

<p>Zoom is a multi-functional video and audio conference web application that combines web-based meetings with integrated collaboration tools.</p>

<p><em>Note: Zoom is not available to UI Hospital and Clinics</em></p>

<h3><span style="color: #b22222"><span style="font-size: 16px">Features</span></span></h3>

<p>Faculty and staff can host meetings with real-time data, application, voice, and video sharing capabilities:</p>

<ul>
	<li>Schedule, host, and attend video and audio meetings</li>
	<li>Connect with video and online chat</li>
	<li>Share application, documents, video, multimedia files, and web browsers</li>
	<li>Use online whiteboards and make annotations</li>
	<li>Talk through your computer, landline, or mobile device</li>
	<li>Integrate with Outlook and other calendar applications</li>
	<li>Join on-the-go with your mobile device</li>
</ul>

<h3><span style="color: #b22222"><span style="font-size: 16px">Requirements</span></span></h3>

<p>For more information on systems requirements, visit <a href="https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/201362023-System-Requirements-for-PC-Mac-and-Linux" rel="noopener" target="_blank">Zoom System Requirements for PC, Mac and Linux</a>.</p>

<h2><span style="font-size: 18px"><span style="color: #000080"><strong><big>Who Is Eligible To Use It?</big></strong></span></span></h2>

<ul>
	<li>Students</li>
	<li>Faculty </li>
	<li>Staff</li>
</ul>

<h2><span style="font-size: 18px"><span style="color: #000080"><strong><big>Where Can I Get It?</big></strong></span></span></h2>

<p>Select the <strong>Access Zoom</strong> button located on this page.</p>

<ul>
	<li>First time UIC Zoom users need to log in via the Web Interface to create their account (<a href="https://uic.zoom.us/" rel="noopener" target="_blank">uic.zoom.us</a>). This will generate your UIC Zoom account.</li>
	<li>Please make sure you use your University of Illinois NetID and password.</li>
</ul>

<h2><span style="font-size: 18px"><span style="color: #000080"><strong><big>How Do I Use It?</big></strong></span></span></h2>

<p>First off, take a look at <a href="https://help.uillinois.edu/TDClient/37/uic/KB/ArticleDet?ID=1502">how do I get started with Zoom</a>. Once you're set up, review our<a href="https://help.uillinois.edu/TDClient/37/uic/KB/ArticleDet?ID=1501"> best practices for using Zoom</a>.​​​​​</p>

<h2><span style="font-size: 18px"><span style="color: #000080"><strong><big>How Much Does It Cost?</big></strong></span></span></h2>

<p>This service is funded by the <a href="https://help.uillinois.edu/TDClient/37/uic/KB/ArticleDet?ID=1596" target="_blank">University</a>; there are no direct costs to clients.</p>

<h2><span style="font-size: 18px"><span style="color: #000080"><strong><big>How Can I Get Support?</big></strong></span></span></h2>

<p>If you are experiencing a problem with this service, please <a href="https://help.uillinois.edu/TDClient/37/uic/Requests/ServiceDet?ID=489" rel="noreferrer noopener" tabindex="-1" target="_blank" title="https://help.uillinois.edu/tdclient/37/uic/requests/servicedet?id=489">report it</a>. If you just have a question, feel free to <a href="https://help.uillinois.edu/TDClient/37/uic/Requests/ServiceDet?ID=488" target="_blank">ask us</a>.</p>

<h3><span style="color: #b22222"><span style="font-size: 16px">Service Levels</span></span></h3>

<div class="table-responsive">
<table class="table table-striped table-bordered" style="width: 100%" border="1" cellpadding="3" cellspacing="1" height="325" width="1073">
	<tbody>
		<tr>
			<th style="vertical-align: middle; width: 30%;" scope="row">Service Request Fulfillment Time</th>
			<td style="vertical-align: middle">Under 2 business days, unless in-person training/discussion is required, or escalation to the vendor is required</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<th style="vertical-align: middle; width: 30%;" scope="row">Incident Resolution Time</th>
			<td style="vertical-align: middle">Under 2 business days, unless in-person training/discussion is required, or escalation to the vendor is required</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<th style="vertical-align: middle; width: 30%;" scope="row">Service Availability</th>
			<td style="vertical-align: middle">24x7</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<th style="vertical-align: middle; width: 30%;" scope="row">Maintenance Window(s)</th>
			<td style="vertical-align: middle">Approved Technology Solutions maintenance window(s)</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<th style="vertical-align: middle; width: 30%;" scope="row">Service Notification Channel(s)</th>
			<td style="vertical-align: middle">Approved Technology Solutions maintenance window(s) Direct emails to campus users. Zoom Login Page: uic.zoom.us</td>
		</tr>
	</tbody>
</table>
